violations.message: I'll analyze this code systematically against all 72 violation patterns.FAIL: Line 66-67: Subprocess Exit Ignored (subprocess.run with check=True but returncode checked instead of relying on exception); Line 100-103: Subprocess Exit Ignored (subprocess.run with check=False - should use check=True and handle exception); Line 126-129: Subprocess Exit Ignored (subprocess.run without check parameter - defaults to False); Line 149-150: Subprocess Exit Ignored (subprocess.run without check parameter - defaults to False); Line 11: Direct Subprocess Calls (import subprocess outside /base workers - should use SystemCommandWorker); Multiple instances Lines 66, 89-103, 119-129, 138-150: Direct Subprocess Calls (subprocess.run/create_subprocess_exec outside /base workers); Line 11: Subprocess Partial Path (shutil.which usage but still calling subprocess with resolved paths - should use workers); Lines 89-103, 119-129, 138-150: Subprocess Partial Path (even with resolved uv_exe, direct subprocess calls violate worker pattern); Line 163: Fabricated Paths/Values on Error (empty dict returned from json.loads failure masks actual error)
